SEARCH

Class EnquiryStorage

java.lang.Object
EnquiryStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storage
public class EnquiryStorage extends Object implements Storage
EnquiryStorage is an implementation of Storage that stores Enquiry objects. It contains methods to print all enquiries, print enquiries by sender, and populate data from a CSV file.
Since:
2023-11-24
Version:
1.0
See Also:
